Plot: An American seminary student travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.
Title: The Rite
Actors: Anthony Hopkins, Colin O'Donoghue, Alice Braga, Ciarán Hinds
tomatoConsensus: Anthony Hopkins is as excellent as ever, but he's no match for The Rite's dawdling pace and lack of chills -- or Colin O'Donoghue's tentative performance in the leading role.
Language: English, Welsh, Italian, Latin, Russian, Hungarian
